publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-477 Mr Jack McConnell: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transitory and Transitional Provisions) (Appropriations) Amendment (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Finance Committee in consideration of The Scotland Act 1998 (Transitory and Transitional Provisions) (Appropriations) Amendment (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.
